name: Who turned on the lights?
description:
Things get messy when the lights turn on. 

Run, Kyle! They're coming!

You are the only one sane robot on that organization. Your objective is to resolve the puzzles to find an exit. The chaos comes when the lights turn on, so be careful.

Controls: 

WASD -> Movement Player

Left Click -> Shoot where you aiming

Right Click -> Move Camera

E -> Interactuate with objects

F -> Throw boxes

R -> Restart level

Enjoy it!

The game was made by elxipi54 and me for the Brackeys Game Jam 6 (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2).
